text: An education ministry is a national or part of the government that directs education in a country. Many other names are commonly used to name these types of ministries, such as Ministry of Education, Department of Education, and Ministry of Public Education, and the leader of this type of group can be a minister of education or secretary of education. These groups take care of problems in educating children in a country like the quality of schools. ==References== Category:Ministries Category:Education
title: Ministry of Education
